Text.val: 14.07.2011 SCR16602 Fixed problem with DSQL for DEBH/DEBC selection for legal and commercial groups

ExpSyntax.val: Trim ({1,4})&' '&' or DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP = '&Trim (Str ({0,4},'9'))&' and '&'DEBC_ADMNO ='&' '&Trim (Str ({0,2},'4'))&' and '&'DEBC_CLNTNO ='&' '&Trim (Str ({0,3},'5'))&' and '&'DEBC_DATDELETED is null'
Trim ({1,4})&' '&' or '&'DEBC_ADMNO ='&' '&Trim (Str ({0,3},'4'))&' and '&'DEBC_CLNTNO ='&' '&Trim (Str ({0,4},'5'))&' and '&'DEBC_DATDELETED is null'
'join '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBH on DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = '&Trim (Str ({0,6},'9'))&' and DEBH_DATDELETED is null'&' and '&'DEBH_NO=DEBC_DEBH'
'join '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBH on DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = '&Trim (Str ({0,8},'9'))&' and DEBH_DATDELETED is null'
Trim ({1,4})&' '&' or '&'DEBC_ADMNO ='&' '&Trim (Str ({0,3},'4'))&' and '&'DEBC_CLNTNO ='&' '&Trim (Str ({0,4},'5'))&' and '&'DEBC_DATDELETED is null'
'join '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBH on DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1 = '&Trim (Str ({0,6},'9'))&' and DEBH_DATDELETED is null'&' and '&'DEBH_NO=DEBC_DEBH'
'join '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBH on DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1 = '&Trim (Str ({0,8},'9'))&' and DEBH_DATDELETED is null'
